divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a large orange light which I watched hover for 1 minute. 4 projectiles with a tail seemed to shhot from this object heading west away from me. The large light then disappeared. The 4 projectiles then disappeared. A few seconds later, 3 lights forming a triangle appeared one by one and then a 4 lit to form a square. They pulsated randomly on and off and moved from side to side before all 4 eventually fading.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Miamisburg
There were no other sightings in Miamisburg on or around October 12th 2013
